TopicTitle: a few questions about star systems and planet factory ce

Articles.Content:
ill get straight to the point

does star systems work for ksp 0.90 or will I have to go and find another mod that adds more stars

and how does the planet factory ce mod work with star systems, can someone please give me a general run down of how the process of adding planets to the other stars works, and maybe a few suggestions about what planet packs to look out for?

It it semi working for me. The main bugs I find are ships in interstellar transits tend to be hell krakened. And stuff in Kerbin orbit I frequently find in orbit around the black hole.

PFCE with Star Systems work fine, the planets are around the new stars.

look at kopernicusteach and/or kopernicus. It's the successor to PFCE....sort of.....

planet packs using kopernicus or kopernicustech:

http://outer-planets.wikia.com/wiki/Planet_Packs
